name: Heat Death of the Universe
description:
A puzzle platformer set in the empty void of space. Guided by star dust, the player must navigate to dying stars across invisible platforms. Environments change, platforms shift, and emitters evolve. A calming and meditative experience with gentle music and simple mechanics,  players will have to combine patience, blind faith, memory, and observational skills to hop to safety. 

Heat Death of the Universe is in development. All feedback is appreciated!

Controls:

WASD, Space, and Shift for movement

Esc to quit

P to pause
